alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:44AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Terrebonne and central Lafourche Parishes through 915 AM CDT... At 843 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Houma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Larose, Cut Off, Galliano, Lockport, Mathews, Gray, Chauvin, Montegut, Bayou Cane and Raceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
